TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PortableExecutableKinds extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the nature of the code in an executable file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To obtain this value for a module, use the <xref:System.Reflection.Module.GetPEKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
> [!NOTE] > This enumeration corresponds to the `CorPEKind` enumeration in the unmanaged reflection API, which is accessed by the unmanaged `GetPEKind` function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds ILOnly = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The executable contains only Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), and is therefore neutral with respect to 32-bit or 64-bit platforms.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds NotAPortableExecutableImage = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The file is not in portable executable (PE) file format.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds PE32Plus = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds Preferred32Bit = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The executable is platform-agnostic but should be run on a 32-bit platform whenever possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds Required32Bit = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The executable can be run on a 32-bit platform, or in the 32-bit Windows on Windows (WOW) environment on a 64-bit platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds Unmanaged32Bit = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The executable contains pure unmanaged code.
